name: HTML and CSS
description: HTML and CSS work together to allow web developers to create beatifully designed webpages with both content and styling.

name: Handlebars
description: Handlebars allows web developers to create dynamic and essentially auto-generating webpages. It is an example of a templating engine.

name: Model-View-Controller
description: Model-View-Controller framework is an architectural pattern that adheres to the separation of concerns principle.
